DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , placebo control study . Patients randomize receive beta interferon thalidomide placebo ( arm I ) , thalidomide beta interferon placebo ( arm II ) , placebo beta interferon thalidomide ( arm III ) . Patients receive interferon beta subcutaneous injection thalidomide orally . All patient maintain glyceryl trierucate glyceryl trioleate ( Lorenzo 's oil ) therapy . Patients follow 3 , 6 , 12 month may follow every 6 month thereafter .
